New Records: Tarik Skubal lowered his ERA to 2.50 and retook the league lead with 214 strikeouts
Key Match Events: Riley Greene's missed catch could have changed the game's outcome
Skubal almost caught a comebacker but made a critical error
Post-Match Reflections: The Tigers fell 3 1/2 games behind Minnesota in the AL Wild Card chase
Skubal expressed frustration with his performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockies' starter Ryan Feltner outperformed the Tigers' offense
The Tigers' offense struggled despite having scored 27 runs in their previous three games
